propertyType.name: fndRegistrationIp
propertyType.displayName: Field Network Director IP for gateway
propertyType.description: IP Address specified in gateway for SNMP Traps, Recovery profile and FND periodic profile

propertyType.name: fndRegistrationPort
propertyType.displayName: Field Network Director Web Service Port for the gateway
propertyType.description: FND Service Port specified in gateway for Recovery Profile and FND periodic profile

propertyType.name: fndSnmpPort
propertyType.displayName: Field Network Director SNMP Port for gateway
propertyType.description: FND Service SNMP Port specified in gateway for SNMP Traps

propertyType.name: dhcpHelperAddress
propertyType.description: IPv4 Address of the DHCP Helper

propertyType.name: apn1
propertyType.description: Enter the Primary Cellular Access Point Name

propertyType.name: apn2
propertyType.description: Enter the Secondary Cellular Access Point Name

propertyType.name: ethernetPriority
propertyType.description: Enter priority of the Ethernet Port

propertyType.name: cell0Priority
propertyType.description: Enter default interface for the WAN

propertyType.name: cell1Priority
propertyType.displayName: Default WAN priority of Cellular Modem 1
propertyType.description: Enter priority of the Cellular Modem 1

propertyType.name: lanNetwork
propertyType.description: IPv4 Address of the LAN Network

propertyType.name: ntpIP
propertyType.description: Enter the NTP address to sync time

propertyType.name: clockTZ
propertyType.seedValues: [ { "key": "Provide 'clockTZ' per device", "value": "${far.clockTZ}" }, { "key": "UTC+12 ANAT", "value": "anat" }, { "key": "UTC+11 SBT", "value": "sbt" }, { "key": "UTC+10 AEST", "value": "aest" }, { "key": "UTC+9 JST", "value": "jst" }, { "key": "UTC+8 CST", "value": "cst" }, { "key": "UTC+7 WIB", "value": "wib" }, { "key": "UTC+6 BST", "value": "bst" }, { "key": "UTC+5 UZT", "value": "uzt" }, { "key": "UTC+4 GST", "value": "gst" }, { "key": "UTC+3 MSK", "value": "msk" }, { "key": "UTC+2 CEST", "value": "cest" }, { "key": "UTC+1 BST", "value": "bst" }, { "key": "UTC+0 GMT", "value": "gmt" }, { "key": "UTC-1 CVT", "value": "cvt" }, { "key": "UTC-2 WGST", "value": "wgst" }, { "key": "UTC-3 ART", "value": "art" }, { "key": "UTC-4 EDT", "value": "edt" }, { "key": "UTC-5 CDT", "value": "cdt" }, { "key": "UTC-6 MST", "value": "mst" }, { "key": "UTC-7 PDT", "value": "pdt" }, { "key": "UTC-8 AKDT", "value": "akdt" }, { "key": "UTC-9 HDT", "value": "hdt" }, { "key": "UTC-10 HST", "value": "hst" }, { "key": "UTC-11 NUT", "value": "nut" }, { "key": "UTC-12 AoE", "value": "aoe" } ]

propertyType.description: IPv4 Address of the Backup HeadEnd

propertyType.description: Pre-shared key of the Backup HeadEnd

propertyType.name: snmpHost
propertyType.displayName: Enter IP address of SNMP Host
propertyType.description: Enter IP address of SNMP Host

propertyType.name: qosType
propertyType.seedValues: [{ "key": "Provide 'qosType' per device", "value": "${far.qosType}" }, { "key": "Broadcast TV, live events, video surveillance", "value":"broadcast-video" }, { "key": "Non-interactive data applications", "value":"bulk-data" }, { "key": "Multimedia Collaboration applications", "value":"multimedia-conferencing"}, { "key": "Video-On-Demand (VoD) streaming video", "value":"multimedia-streaming"}, { "key": "Network Control Plane traffic", "value":"network-control"}, { "key": "Network operations, administration, and management traffic", "value":"ops-admin-mgmt"}, { "key": "High-definition interactive video applications", "value":"real-time-interactive"}, { "key": "Signaling traffic that supports IP voice and video telephony", "value":"signaling"}, { "key": "Interactive data applications", "value":"transactional-data"}, { "key": "VoIP telephony traffic", "value":"voip-telephony"} ]
